summary: Website to create a cute interactive Valentine-style webpage invitation.

existing_features.title: Create a Valentine invitation builder flow that lets a user enter invitation details and see a live preview before publishing.
Implement a publish/share mechanism that generates a unique invitation URL and a public invitation view page that renders the invitation by ID.
Add cute interactive Valentine-style behaviors to the public invitation view (animations and small interactions), while keeping the content readable and accessible.
Apply a consistent, coherent visual theme suitable for a Valentine invitation experience (warm, romantic, cute) across builder, preview, and invitation view pages.
Add generated static image assets for the Valentine theme and render them in the UI (do not serve images through the backend).

Update the app’s user-facing branding text to use the website/app name “yourlove”, replacing existing “Valentine Invitation Builder”/similar app-name strings in the UI while keeping the existing Valentine invitation functionality unchanged.
Update the HTML document title (browser tab title) to “yourlove”.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website that lets the user create a cute, interactive Valentine-style webpage invitation.
Backend: add Motoko data model and APIs to create and fetch invitations by ID in the single main actor.
